messageBody:
1) using junit can we test load test, system testing
etc....

In certain cases where your application is a pure server for java clients
you could use JUnit as a client emulator for some system testing. Mostly
JUnit would be bypassing the usual interfaces into your application and the
resulting tests would not be true system tests. It can be used for load
testing, although you may need some of the add-ons and in any event there
are better tools for most load testing situations.

2) can we use junit for integrating testing

Absolutely, in fact its ideal when you are performing a bottom-up
integration as I am at the moment. If you have a top-down integration
strategy then it would probably be of little use to you.

--
Nic
